pages.about: About Royal Haven Casino & Resort Main Casino About Us Contacts Services About Royal Haven Casino & Resort Discover the story behind Royal Haven and meet the team dedicated to making your stay unforgettable. Our Mission At Royal Haven Casino & Resort, our mission is to provide an unparalleled experience in luxury and entertainment. We aim to create an environment where guests can relax, play, and enjoy every moment of their stay. We are committed to offering exceptional service, world-class amenities, and a wide variety of gaming options to ensure every visit is memorable. Our team of dedicated professionals works tirelessly to exceed our guests' expectations. With a focus on hospitality, innovation, and sustainability, we strive to lead the industry and set new standards for casino and resort experiences. Book Now Our History Founded in 2007, Royal Haven Casino & Resort has grown from a modest establishment to a premier destination for luxury and gaming. Our journey began with a vision to create a space where guests could experience the thrill of the casino while enjoying the comforts of a high-end resort. Over the years, we have expanded our facilities, adding new gaming options, restaurants, and entertainment venues. Each addition has been carefully designed to enhance the guest experience and offer something new and exciting. In 20010, we introduced our first VIP lounge, providing exclusive services to our high-roller guests. This was followed by the opening of our private gaming rooms, which have become a favorite among those seeking privacy and high-stakes action. Our resort has also hosted numerous events, from high-profile poker tournaments to lavish weddings and corporate retreats. These events have helped us build a reputation for excellence and attract guests from around the world. In recent years, we have focused on sustainability, implementing eco-friendly practices throughout the resort. This commitment to the environment ensures that future generations can enjoy the beauty and luxury of Royal Haven. Our history is marked by continuous improvement and a dedication to providing the best possible experience for our guests. We are proud of our achievements and excited for what the future holds. As we look ahead, we remain committed to our core values of hospitality, innovation, and excellence. We invite you to be part of our story and experience the magic of Royal Haven Casino & Resort. Meet Our Team Our dedicated team of professionals is here to ensure you have an unforgettable experience at Royal Haven Casino & Resort. Get to know the people who make it all happen. John Doe CEO Jane Smith CFO Emily Johnson Marketing Director Michael Brown Operations Manager Sarah Davis HR Manager Awards & Achievements 🏆 Best Casino Resort 2023 Awarded by the International Gaming Association for excellence in service and amenities. 🏆 Green Resort Award 2022 Recognized for our commitment to sustainable practices and eco-friendly initiatives. 🏆 Top Luxury Destination 2021 Named one of the top luxury destinations by Travel Magazine. 🏆 Excellence in Hospitality 2020 Honored for our outstanding hospitality services by the National Hospitality Association. pages.casino: Royal Haven Casino - 18+ Only Main Casino About Us Contacts Services Experience the Thrill at Royal Haven Casino Welcome to the ultimate gaming experience. Please note: Entry is restricted to individuals 18 and older. Our Casino Games Poker Join our poker tables for an exciting and strategic game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Roulette Place your bets and watch the wheel spin in our exciting roulette games. Slot Machines Enjoy a variety of slot machines with different themes and jackpot opportunities. Blackjack Try your hand at blackjack and see if you can beat the dealer to 21. pages.contacts: Contact Royal Haven Casino & Resort Main Casino About Us Contacts Services Get in Touch with Royal Haven We'd love to hear from you! Reach out to us with any questions or concerns. Contact Information Feel free to contact us using the information below: Phone: +356 (2256) 8339 Email: royalhaven@gmail.com Address: Marfa Bay, MellieÄ§a, Malta Send Us a Message Name Email Message I agree to the Privacy Policy Send Message Frequently Asked Questions What are the check-in and check-out times? Check-in is from 3 PM, and check-out is until 11 AM. Early check-in and late check-out options are available upon request. Do you offer airport shuttle services? Yes, we provide complimentary airport shuttle services for all our guests. Please contact us in advance to arrange your pick-up. Is there free Wi-Fi available? Yes, we offer complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the resort. Are pets allowed in the resort? Unfortunately, pets are not allowed at our resort. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. What is your cancellation policy? Cancellations made at least 48 hours before the scheduled arrival date will receive a full refund. For cancellations made within 48 hours, a one-night charge will apply. pages.index: Welcome to Royal Haven Casino & Resort Main Casino About Us Contacts Services Welcome to Royal Haven Casino & Resort Experience the pinnacle of luxury and excitement. Book now and embark on your unforgettable journey. Book Now About Us Welcome to Royal Haven Casino & Resort, where luxury meets excitement. Nestled in the heart of Malta, our resort offers an unparalleled blend of world-class casino gaming, fine dining, and exquisite accommodations. Our mission is to provide an exceptional experience that exceeds the expectations of our guests. From the moment you step through our doors, you'll be immersed in a world of elegance and entertainment. With state-of-the-art facilities and a dedicated team, we strive to create a memorable stay for every visitor. Whether you're here for the thrill of the games or the relaxation of our amenities, Royal Haven is your ultimate destination. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Royal Haven Main Casino About Us Contacts Services Privacy Policy 1. Introduction Welcome to Royal Haven Casino & Resort. We are dedicated to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring your personal information is protected. This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle your data when you visit our website and use our services. 2. Information We Collect We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services, including: Personal Identification Information (name, email address, phone number) Non-Personal Identification Information (browser type, operating system) Financial Information (credit card details, billing address) Location Data (IP address, GPS data) 3. How We Use Your Information The information we collect is used in the following ways: To personalize your experience and respond to your individual needs To improve our website and customer service To process transactions and manage bookings To send periodic emails regarding your order or other products and services To administer a contest, promotion, survey, or other site feature 4. Data Protection and Security We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. Your information is contained behind secured networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights to such systems and are required to keep the information confidential. 5. Sharing of Personal Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computerâs hard drive through your web browser (if you allow) that enables the siteâs or service providerâs systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. 7. Third-Party Links Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third-party products or services on our website. These third-party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. 8. Your Consent By using our site, you consent to our websiteâs privacy policy. 9. Changes to Our Privacy Policy Royal Haven Casino & Resort reserves the right to update this privacy policy at any time. We will notify you of any significant changes by placing a prominent notice on our website. 10. Contacting Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, the practices of this site, or your dealings with this site, please contact us at: royalhaven@gmail.com 11. Data Retention We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. 12. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for use by children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 18. If we become aware that we have collected personal data from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete such information.
